code: @Test public void testTimerListenerManager() throws Exception {     ScheduledExecutorService executor = Executors.newScheduledThreadPool(1).     TimerListenerManager manager = new TimerListenerManager().     manager.setCamelContext(context).     manager.addTimerListener(task).     manager.start().     assertTrue("Should be invoked", task.await()).     manager.stop().     manager.removeTimerListener(task).     executor.shutdown(). }
